welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Westford, a charming town known for its historic buildings and scenic landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport is where all domestic and international flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Logan International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal for free.
